title: Womens Dress
title_original: 3/4 Sleeves Mother of The Bride Dress for Women Laces Appliques Chiffon Mother of The Groom Dress with Jackets

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #263,698 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #205 in Wedding Dresses #1,653 in Women's Formal Dresses

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Wedding Dresses

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and well-made, appreciating its nice material and color.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything should ship from and be delivered from Amazon.
items.body: Dress is beautiful and well made they make the waist to small. Does not ship from Amazon and that was a big mistake ordering from this company. Can't return it because they only wanted to give me a $30.00 refund. Read more
items.author: Debra Goins

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs very small through the bust.
items.body: The dress s very pretty however runs very small. Read more
items.author: Ellen Bartlett

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fit runs small
items.body: Beautiful materials and well made. Comfy but runs small. Zipper was hard to zip Read more
items.author: nkc

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice material
items.body: It was sent in a plastic sealed bag in great condition. I did not remove the tags however once I put it on I did not think it fit attractively. It was too big and yet it is a very nice dress. Am returning it today. Judith Paine-Marshall Read more
items.author: bikinjudy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars true to size
items.body: Fit was perfect, length great, looked terrific Read more
items.author: mary henry

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just OKAY
items.body: I would not order this again. Ended up missing return window, but bought something else to wear to my event. Read more
items.author: Fitbit Mom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bien recomendado♥️
items.body: Muy buena calidad y elegante, me encantó y cumplió las expectativas. Read more
items.author: Ileana Gonzalez

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t customize dress length
items.body: The dress was well made. I requested custom sizing which was included. Dress was not shortened to the specifications I sent. I will need to have it tailored. The color is as represented and makes a nice grandmother of the bride dress. Read more
items.author: Mrs. W.

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Cold Pink, Fuchsia, Dusty Pink, Stormy Blue, Desert Rose, Black, Champagne, Lake, Dusty Blue, Peacock, Plum, Blush Pink, Lavender, Royal Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
